detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Lotto.fallback() (repairResNew/SmartBugN/etherpot_lottoU2.sol#84-102):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value - value) (repairResNew/SmartBugN/etherpot_lottoU2.sol#91)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (repairResNew/SmartBugN/etherpot_lottoU2.sol#94)
	- buyersLength = rounds[roundIndex].buyers.length ++ (repairResNew/SmartBugN/etherpot_lottoU2.sol#96)
	- rounds[roundIndex].buyers[buyersLength] = msg.sender (repairResNew/SmartBugN/etherpot_lottoU2.sol#97)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCountByBuyer[msg.sender] += ticketsCount (repairResNew/SmartBugN/etherpot_lottoU2.sol#99)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (repairResNew/SmartBugN/etherpot_lottoU2.sol#100)
	- rounds[roundIndex].pot += value (repairResNew/SmartBugN/etherpot_lottoU2.sol#101)
